description: The project relies on a single backend developer for all NestJS, database, and security-critical sandbox work. Any delay, departure, or unavailability of this person will halt project progress.
mitigation_strategy: Hire a second backend developer (contractor or full-time) to parallelize work and create redundancy.
contingency_plan: De-scope features to reduce backend workload, starting with offline sync and then custom modes.
monitoring_trigger: Backend tasks show >15% variance from estimates for one sprint.

description: The team lacks specialized expertise in security sandboxing (`isolated-vm`), which is a high-risk area. Automated testing alone is insufficient to guarantee security.
mitigation_strategy: Budget and schedule for a third-party penetration test focused on the Lambda sandbox.
contingency_plan: Disable the custom mode feature via a feature flag if a vulnerability is found post-launch.
monitoring_trigger: Internal code review cannot resolve security concerns about the sandbox implementation.
